mapper.sql: COUNT(CALL_NUMBER) TOTAL_COUNT,SUM(CALL_DURATION) TOTAL_DURATION, SUM(CASE CALL_TYPE WHEN '主叫' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CALLER_COUNT,SUM(CASE CALL_TYPE WHEN '主叫' THEN CALL_DURATION ELSE 0 END) CALLER_DURATION, SUM(CASE CALL_TYPE WHEN '被叫' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CALLED_COUNT,SUM(CASE CALL_TYPE WHEN '被叫' THEN CALL_DURATION ELSE 0 END) CALLED_DURATION, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CALL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 7 DAY) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{nowDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) LAST_WEEK_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CALL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{nowDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) LAST_ONE_MONTH_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CALL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 3 MONTH) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{nowDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) LAST_THREE_MONTH_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN HOUR(CALL_DATE) BETWEEN 0 AND 5 THEN 1 END) ZERO_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN HOUR(CALL_DATE) BETWEEN 6 AND 8 THEN 1 END) SIX_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN HOUR(CALL_DATE) BETWEEN 9 AND 17 THEN 1 END) NINE_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN HOUR(CALL_DATE) BETWEEN 18 AND 23 THEN 1 END) EIGHTEEN_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN WEEKDAY(CALL_DATE) BETWEEN 0 AND 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) WORKING_DAY_COUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN WEEKDAY(CALL_DATE) BETWEEN 5 AND 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) WEEKEND_COUNT
mapper.select: select call_type as callType, max(`call_date`) as maxCallDate, min(`call_date`) as minCallDate from t_call_info where `user_info_id`=#{userInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by call_type

select date_format(CALL_DATE , '%Y-%m') as month, count(distinct CALL_NUMBER) as uniqNum , count(distinct call_remote_address) as uniqCity , sum( CASE CALL_TYPE WHEN '主叫' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as outCount , sum( CASE CALL_TYPE WHEN '被叫' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as inCount , sum( CASE CALL_TYPE WHEN '主叫' THEN CALL_DURATION ELSE 0 END) as outDuration , sum( CASE CALL_TYPE WHEN '被叫' THEN CALL_DURATION ELSE 0 END) as inDuration , count(*) as totalCount , sum(CALL_DURATION) as totalDuration from t_call_info where `user_info_id`=#{userInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by date_format(CALL_DATE , '%Y-%m')

select call_remote_address as city, count(distinct CALL_NUMBER) as uniqNum , sum( CASE CALL_TYPE WHEN '主叫' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as outCount , sum( CASE CALL_TYPE WHEN '被叫' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as inCount , sum( CASE CALL_TYPE WHEN '主叫' THEN CALL_DURATION ELSE 0 END) as outDuration , sum( CASE CALL_TYPE WHEN '被叫' THEN CALL_DURATION ELSE 0 END) as inDuration , count(*) as totalCount , sum(CALL_DURATION) as totalDuration from t_call_info where `user_info_id`=#{userInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by call_remote_address
SELECT CALL_NUMBER,, CALL_REMOTE_ADDRESS CALL_NUMBER_ADDRESS FROM t_call_info WHERE USER_INFO_ID = #{userInfoId} GROUP BY CALL_NUMBER,CALL_REMOTE_ADDRESS

SELECT A.* ,p.CITY CALL_NUMBER_ADDRESS FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN LEFT(CALL_NUMBER, 4) = '0086' THEN SUBSTR(CALL_NUMBER, 5) ELSE CALL_NUMBER END CALL_NUMBER,
FROM t_call_info WHERE USER_INFO_ID = #{userInfoId} GROUP BY CASE WHEN LEFT(CALL_NUMBER, 4) = '0086' THEN SUBSTR(CALL_NUMBER, 5) ELSE CALL_NUMBER END ) A LEFT JOIN phone_info p ON LEFT(A.CALL_NUMBER,7)=p.PHONE

SELECT CASE WHEN LEFT(c.CALL_NUMBER, 4) = '0086' THEN SUBSTR(c.CALL_NUMBER, 5) ELSE c.CALL_NUMBER END CALL_NUMBER, COUNT(c.ID) HOLIDAY_COUNT FROM t_call_info c,t_holiday_info h WHERE c.USER_INFO_ID =#{userInfoId} AND DATE_FORMAT(c.CALL_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = h.START_DATE GROUP BY c.CALL_NUMBER
